internships.roledescription: AS A UI/UX DESIGN INTERN AT GOOGLE, YOU WILL WORK REMOTELY FOR 6 MONTHS.
keyresponsibilities: CREATE USER INTERFACES USING FIGMA AND SKETCH.
COLLABORATE WITH DEVELOPERS TO IMPLEMENT DESIGNS.
PROVIDE DESIGN SOLUTIONS THAT ALIGN WITH GOOGLE'S BRANDING GUIDELINES.
WORK CLOSELY WITH PRODUCT MANAGERS TO UNDERSTAND USER NEEDS.
ITERATE ON DESIGNS BASED ON FEEDBACK FROM STAKEHOLDERS.
qualifications: PROFICIENCY IN DESIGN TOOLS SUCH AS FIGMA AND SKETCH.
STRONG PORTFOLIO SHOWCASING UI/UX DESIGN PROJECTS.
ABILITY TO WORK IN A FAST-PACED ENVIRONMENT.
BACHELOR'S DEGREE IN DESIGN, HUMAN-COMPUTER INTERACTION, OR A RELATED FIELD.
benefitsperks: OPPORTUNITY TO WORK WITH A LEADING TECH COMPANY.
POTENTIAL FOR FULL-TIME EMPLOYMENT POST INTERNSHIP.
ACCESS TO GOOGLE'S RESOURCES AND TOOLS.
internships.companyinfo: GOOGLE LLC IS A MULTINATIONAL TECHNOLOGY COMPANY SPECIALIZING IN INTERNET-RELATED SERVICES AND PRODUCTS, INCLUDING ONLINE ADVERTISING TECHNOLOGIES, A SEARCH ENGINE, CLOUD COMPUTING, SOFTWARE, AND HARDWARE.
